title: Wonderful World of Australian Wine
creator_credit: Bob Hoskin and Australian Wine and Brandy Corporation
brief_description: A documentary film on Australian wines discussing varieties and which wines to drink - before a meal; with a meal; after a meal; or anytime. Narrated by John Laws.
